00037 # Trigger  ##################
00038 PassingHLT = cms.EDProducer("trgMatchGsfElectronProducer",    
00039     InputProducer = cms.InputTag( 'gsfElectrons' ),                          
00040     hltTags = cms.untracked.string( HLTPath ),
00041     triggerEventTag = cms.untracked.InputTag("hltTriggerSummaryAOD","",HLTProcessName),
00042     triggerResultsTag = cms.untracked.InputTag("TriggerResults","",HLTProcessName)

00056 import HLTrigger.HLTfilters.hltHighLevel_cfi
00057 ZSCHltFilter = HLTrigger.HLTfilters.hltHighLevel_cfi.hltHighLevel.clone(
00058     throw = cms.bool(False),
00059     HLTPaths = ['HLT_Ele27_CaloIdT_CaloIsoVL_TrkIdVL_TrkIsoVL_Ele15_CaloIdT_CaloIsoVL_trackless_v*']
00060     )
00061 
00062 # elecMetSeq = cms.Sequence( WEnuHltFilter * ele_sequence * elecMetFilter )
00063 
00064 
00065 selectedElectrons = cms.EDFilter("GsfElectronRefSelector",
00066                                  src = cms.InputTag( 'gsfElectrons' ),
00067                                  cut = cms.string(
00068     "(abs(superCluster.eta)<2.5) && (energy*sin(superClusterPosition.theta)> 15)")
00069                                          )
00070 # This are the cuts at trigger level except ecalIso
00071 PassingVeryLooseId = selectedElectrons.clone(
00072     cut = cms.string(
00073     selectedElectrons.cut.value() +
00074     " && (gsfTrack.trackerExpectedHitsInner.numberOfHits<=1)" #wrt std WP90 allowing 1 numberOfMissingExpectedHits
00075     " && ((isEB"
00076     " && ( dr03TkSumPt/p4.Pt <0.2 "#&& dr03EcalRecHitSumEt/p4.Pt < 0.3
00077     " && dr03HcalTowerSumEt/p4.Pt  < 0.2 )"
00078     " && (sigmaIetaIeta<0.01)"
00079     " && ( -0.15<deltaPhiSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.15 )"
00080     " && ( -0.007<deltaEtaSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.007 )"
00081     " && (hadronicOverEm<0.12)"
00082     ")"
00083     " || (isEE"
00084     " && ( dr03TkSumPt/p4.Pt <0.2"
00085     #&& dr03EcalRecHitSumEt/p4.Pt < 0.3
00086     " && dr03HcalTowerSumEt/p4.Pt  < 0.2 )"
00087     " && (sigmaIetaIeta<0.03)"
00088     " && ( -0.10<deltaPhiSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.10 )"
00089     " && ( -0.009<deltaEtaSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.009 )"
00090     " && (hadronicOverEm<0.10) "
00091     "))"
00092     )
00093     )
00094 PassingMediumId = selectedElectrons.clone(
00095     cut = cms.string(
00096     selectedElectrons.cut.value() +
00097     " && (gsfTrack.trackerExpectedHitsInner.numberOfHits<=1)" #wrt std WP90 allowing 1 numberOfMissingExpectedHits
00098     " && ((isEB"
00099     " && ( dr03TkSumPt/p4.Pt <0.2 "#&& dr03EcalRecHitSumEt/p4.Pt < 0.3
00100     " && dr03HcalTowerSumEt/p4.Pt  < 0.2 )"
00101     " && (sigmaIetaIeta<0.01)"
00102     " && ( -0.06<deltaPhiSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.06 )"
00103     " && ( -0.004<deltaEtaSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.004 )"
00104     " && (hadronicOverEm<0.12)"
00105     ")"
00106     " || (isEE"
00107     " && ( dr03TkSumPt/p4.Pt <0.2"
00108     #&& dr03EcalRecHitSumEt/p4.Pt < 0.3
00109     " && dr03HcalTowerSumEt/p4.Pt  < 0.2 )"
00110     " && (sigmaIetaIeta<0.03)"
00111     " && ( -0.03<deltaPhiSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.03 )"
00112     " && ( -0.007<deltaEtaSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.007 )"
00113     " && (hadronicOverEm<0.10) "
00114     "))"
00115     )
00116     )
00117 
00118 PassingTightId = selectedElectrons.clone(
00119     cut = cms.string(
00120     selectedElectrons.cut.value() +
00121     " && (gsfTrack.trackerExpectedHitsInner.numberOfHits<=0)" #wrt std WP90 allowing 1 numberOfMissingExpectedHits
00122     " && ((isEB"
00123     " && ( dr03TkSumPt/p4.Pt <0.2 "#&& dr03EcalRecHitSumEt/p4.Pt < 0.3
00124     " && dr03HcalTowerSumEt/p4.Pt  < 0.2 )"
00125     " && (sigmaIetaIeta<0.01)"
00126     " && ( -0.03<deltaPhiSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.03 )"
00127     " && ( -0.004<deltaEtaSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.004 )"
00128     " && (hadronicOverEm<0.12)"
00129     ")"
00130     " || (isEE"
00131     " && ( dr03TkSumPt/p4.Pt <0.2"
00132     #&& dr03EcalRecHitSumEt/p4.Pt < 0.3
00133     " && dr03HcalTowerSumEt/p4.Pt  < 0.2 )"
00134     " && (sigmaIetaIeta<0.03)"
00135     " && ( -0.02<deltaPhiSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.02 )"
00136     " && ( -0.007<deltaEtaSuperClusterTrackAtVtx<0.007 )"
00137     " && (hadronicOverEm<0.10) "
00138     "))"
00139     )
00140     )

00142 #------------------------------ electronID producer
00143 from Calibration.EleSelectionProducers.eleselectionproducers_cfi import *
00144 # process.EleSelectionProducers
00145 
00146 SCselector = cms.EDFilter("SuperClusterSelector",
00147                           src = cms.InputTag('correctedMulti5x5SuperClustersWithPreshower'),
00148                           cut = cms.string('(eta>2.4 || eta<-2.4) && (energy*sin(position.theta)> 15)')
00149                           )
00150 
00151 ### Build candidates from all the merged superclusters
00152 eleSC = cms.EDProducer('ConcreteEcalCandidateProducer',
00153                   src = cms.InputTag('SCselector'),
00154                   particleType = cms.string('gamma')
00155                   )
00156 
00157 selectedCands = cms.EDFilter("AssociatedVariableMaxCutCandRefSelector",
00158                              src = cms.InputTag("eleSelectionProducers:loose"),
00159                              max = cms.double("0.5")
00160                              )
00161 
00162 eleSelSeq = cms.Sequence(
00163     PassingVeryLooseId + PassingMediumId + PassingTightId + #(eleSelectionProducers * selectedCands) +
00164     (SCselector*eleSC))
00165 
00166 
00167 ############################################################
00168 # Selectors
00169 ##############################
00170 ZeeSelector =  cms.EDProducer("CandViewShallowCloneCombiner",
00171                               decay = cms.string("PassingVeryLooseId PassingVeryLooseId"),
00172                               checkCharge = cms.bool(False),
00173                               cut   = cms.string("mass > 40 && mass < 140")
00174                               )
00175 
00176 
00177 #met, mt cuts for W selection
00178 MT="sqrt(2*daughter(0).pt*daughter(1).pt*(1 - cos(daughter(0).phi - daughter(1).phi)))"
00179 MET_CUT_MIN = 25.
00180 W_ELECTRON_ET_CUT_MIN = 30.0
00181 MT_CUT_MIN = 50.
00182 
00183 WenuSelector = cms.EDProducer("CandViewShallowCloneCombiner",
00184     decay = cms.string("pfMet PassingTightId"), # charge coniugate states are implied
00185     checkCharge = cms.bool(False),                           
00186     cut   = cms.string(("daughter(0).pt > %f && daughter(1).pt > %f && "+MT+" > %f") % (MET_CUT_MIN, W_ELECTRON_ET_CUT_MIN, MT_CUT_MIN))
00187 )
00188 
00189 
00190 EleSCSelector = cms.EDProducer("CandViewShallowCloneCombiner",
00191                                decay = cms.string("PassingVeryLooseId eleSC"),
00192                                checkCharge = cms.bool(False), 
00193                                cut   = cms.string("mass > 40 && mass < 140")
00194                                )
00195 WZSelector = cms.EDProducer("CandMerger",
00196                             src = cms.VInputTag("WenuSelector", "ZeeSelector", "EleSCSelector")
00197                             )
00198 
00199  
00200 
00201 ############################################################
00202 # Filters
00203 ##############################
00204 WenuFilter = cms.EDFilter("CandViewCountFilter",
00205                           src = cms.InputTag("WenuSelector"),
00206                           minNumber = cms.uint32(1)
00207                           )
00208 # filter events with at least one Zee candidate as identified by the ZeeSelector
00209 ZeeFilter = cms.EDFilter("CandViewCountFilter",
00210                          src = cms.InputTag("ZeeSelector"),
00211                          minNumber = cms.uint32(1)
00212                          )
00213 
00214 WZFilter = cms.EDFilter("CandViewCountFilter",
00215                          src = cms.InputTag("WZSelector"),
00216                          minNumber = cms.uint32(1)
00217                          )
00218 
00219 ZSCFilter = cms.EDFilter("CandViewCountFilter",
00220                          src = cms.InputTag("eleSC"),
00221                          minNumber = cms.uint32(1)
00222                          )
00223 FilterSeq = cms.Sequence(eleSelSeq * (ZeeSelector + WenuSelector + EleSCSelector))
00224 ZeeFilterSeq = cms.Sequence(eleSelSeq * ZeeSelector * ZeeFilter)    
00225 WenuFilterSeq = cms.Sequence(eleSelSeq * WenuSelector * WenuFilter)
00226 WZFilterSeq = cms.Sequence(eleSelSeq * WZFilter)
00227 ZSCFilterSeq    = cms.Sequence(ZSCHltFilter * eleSelSeq * EleSCSelector * ZSCFilter)
